ATutor Receives Gold IMS Learning Impact Award



  • 2008-05-15 09:33:16

    ATutor Receives Gold IMS Learning Impact Award

    We're very pleased to announce that ATutor has received a Gold IMS Learning Impact Award. It also received three best in show awards for best user personalization, best collaborative online environment, and best open source project. Congratulations goes to everyone who has contributed over the years, once again. We're on a roll! Keep up the good work.


  • 2008-05-20 21:10:37
